column5: Got out again today and the bite was stellar!!!! Hit the ice at sunrise again.    The pike were super agressive and smashing jigs with wreckless abandon!!! I had my first fish before the jig hit bottom!! My first 7 drops produced 7 fish landed out of 10 fish on!!!! Lost count of all the fish today but figure I landed close to 30 in the 5 or so hours out on the lake. All of the fish I was catching were those pesky 24"-30" fish again. Come sundown though the bigger fish turned on and I got about  1/2 dozen over 30". The biggest taped out at 38" or so.
Nice! And I was excited with our 17" snot rocket!
Sweet catches!!!  Nothing wrong with that!
Great looking fish.  Congrats on your catches.
Wow  Sounds like a really fun day...
Had no idea there was sunrise there.  Nice Pike!
I usually just smash them off the hook with a baseball bat but figured you might like to see what a real pike looks like.    :tease:
lol does that help get those damn y bones out... i have yet to clean a pike and get all those pesky bones
lol...well now that you have sooooo generously edumacated me on what snot rockets look like take the slugger with ya.
You got a nice setup there Dave. Next up: lakers?
That's the plan for next weekend.
Nice day on the ice for sure Dave !!! Some very nice pike !!!!
pike sizes are inversely proportional with geographical latitude
